entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning early this morning then changing to freezing rain this morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain near midnight. Risk of thunderstorms overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
